EmailTemplate.name: RE: Morgan update (1342644004.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Morgan update (1342644004.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Norman, Will do…I sent the faxes over to you…they had no signatures on them. Can you resend with client signatures? I will make a note to check in with you on Friday about the State Order. Thanks, Sara From: Norman Davis [mailto:ndavis4@msn.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2012 10:34 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Morgan update Hi Sara,
My mgr just came back from vacation and there has been a mgr change so things are hectic. He has teh timesheets and I should have them signed this week. I wanted to know if I can fax them to you and would you be able to scan them in because I'm having issues with my system?
Also the state will be sending you another order to only take out 424 for this upcoming pay period fo rthe end of July. I f you dont receive it by Friday,let me know and I'll have them fax it.
Thanks
I'll keep you posted
Norman
